name: Wanderer, a location-based mobile game
description:
Explore the world around you while gathering resources, unlocking crafting recipes, and earning recolors for your favorite pieces of furniture and decoration! In this unique location-based game you'll have a relaxing experience while traversing the world, before retreating to your own customizable home, furnished by you.

 - Discover your hidden surroundings as your interact with multiple points of interest to gather resources

 - Unlock recipes to make more furniture and decorations, and complete tasks to unlock more colors for your crafted items

 - Furnish and decorate your own living area with everything you've earned and built

Notes

 - No in-game advertisements or purchases

 - Compatible with devices on Android Version 7.0 (Nougat) or above. Application may not run on certain devices depending on their specs

 - Internet, GPS, and location are required to play. View our privacy policy for how we use this information (hint: it's not sold, and only information necessary for QA is stored)

Don't have an android, or want to try the game before downloading it? A webgl (in-browser) version of the game can be found here.
